DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to learn the biodistribution of injection of BMS747158 at stress and assess the safety of two doses of BMS747158
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study in Healthy Volunteers to Assess Dosimetry and Safety Following Injection of BMS747158 at Stress
DOC.criteria: age 1840 BMI 1830 kg/m2 No active or chronic illnesses If female: not pregnant, use of birth control or not of childbearing potential Significant active or chronic illness Any neurological disorder GI disease within 3 months Recent infection Major surgery within 4 weeks Donation of blood within 4 weeks Blood transfusion within 4 weeks Recent history drug/alcohol abuse Head trauma Significant screening ECG, EEG, lab tests, physical exam and vital signs abnormalities Prescription or OTC drugs within 2 weeks Exposure to any other investigational
